object.name: editMessageText
object.description: Use this method to edit text and game messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned. Note that business messages that were not sent by the bot and do not contain an inline keyboard can only be edited within 48 hours from the time they were sent.
object.html_description: Use this method to edit text and game messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited Message is returned, otherwise True is returned. Note that business messages that were not sent by the bot and do not contain an inline keyboard can only be edited within 48 hours from the time they were sent.
object.rst_description: Use this method to edit text and `game <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#games>`_ messages. On success, if the edited message is not an inline message, the edited :class:`aiogram.types.message.Message` is returned, otherwise :code:`True` is returned. Note that business messages that were not sent by the bot and do not contain an inline keyboard can only be edited within **48 hours** from the time they were sent.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message to be edited was sent
annotations.html_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message to be edited was sent
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the business connection on behalf of which the message to be edited was sent
annotations.name: business_connection_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format @channelusername)
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Unique identifier for the target chat or username of the target channel (in the format :code:`@channelusername`)
annotations.name: chat_id

annotations.description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.html_description: Required if inline_message_id is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.rst_description: Required if *inline_message_id* is not specified. Identifier of the message to edit
annotations.name: message_id

annotations.description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.html_description: Required if chat_id and message_id are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.rst_description: Required if *chat_id* and *message_id* are not specified. Identifier of the inline message
annotations.name: inline_message_id

annotations.description: New text of the message, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.html_description: New text of the message, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.rst_description: New text of the message, 1-4096 characters after entities parsing
annotations.name: text

annotations.description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.html_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See formatting options for more details.
annotations.rst_description: Mode for parsing entities in the message text. See `formatting options <https://core.telegram.org/bots/api#formatting-options>`_ for more details.
annotations.name: parse_mode

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.html_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of parse_mode
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized list of special entities that appear in message text, which can be specified instead of *parse_mode*
annotations.name: entities

annotations.description: Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.html_description: Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.rst_description: Link preview generation options for the message
annotations.name: link_preview_options

annotations.description: A JSON-serialized object for an inline keyboard.
annotations.rst_description: A JSON-serialized object for an `inline keyboard <https://core.telegram.org/bots/features#inline-keyboards>`_.
annotations.name: reply_markup

annotations.description: Disables link previews for links in this message
annotations.html_description: Disables link previews for links in this message
annotations.rst_description: Disables link previews for links in this message
annotations.name: disable_web_page_preview
